tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_details TEXT,
    user_preference JSON
)

CREATE TABLE ARSportsGame (
  game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  game_type VARCHAR(50),
  game_score INT,
  game_completed BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserInteractions(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_game_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    session_start_time TIMESTAMP,
    session_end_time TIMESTAMP,
    game_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE game_statistics (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_name VARCHAR(100),
    total_players INT,
    average_game_time INTERVAL,
    most_popular_sport VARCHAR(50)
);
